snippet: President Hassan Rouhani said Iranians were entitled to have major issues put to a nationwide vote, according to the country’s Constitution.
abstract: Iran's Pres Hassan Rouhani says Iranians are entitled to have major issues put to nationwide vote, signaling lucid warning to hard-liners who control most institutions but have diminishing support; broaches possibility of organizing direct referendums for voters.
lead_paragraph: President Hassan Rouhani said Iranians were entitled to have major issues put to a nationwide vote, according to the country’s Constitution.

headline.main: Iran Leader Suggests Direct Votes on Issues
headline.print_headline: Iran Leader Suggests Direct Votes on Issues
